title: Notice of Board Meeting
head_office_address: No. 12 Ihama Road, G.R.A, Benin City, Edo State
meeting_location: 5th floor, AIICO Plaza, Plot PC 12, Churchgate Street, Victoria Island, Lagos
detailed_summary:
### Summary of Corporate Disclosure Document

#### Purpose and Nature of the Disclosure
The document serves as a formal notice for a scheduled meeting of the Board of Directors of Ellah Lakes Plc. It outlines the date, time, and location of the meeting, as well as the agenda to consider the Company's activities.

#### Key Dates
- **Date of Notice**: 15 March 2024
- **Date of Board Meeting**: 27 March 2024
- **Time of Meeting**: 11:00 AM

#### Location of the Meeting
- **Venue**: 5th floor, AIICO Plaza, Plot PC 12, Churchgate Street, Victoria Island, Lagos

#### Board of Directors
The following individuals are listed as directors of Ellah Lakes Plc:
- Chuka Mordi
- Osaro Oyegun
- Evans Jakpa-Johns
- Maxwell Oko
- Nnenna Onyewuchi
- Enotie Ogbebor
- Chijioke Dozie
- Joe Attueyi
- Charles Anajemba

#### Company Information
- **Company Name**: Ellah Lakes Plc
- **Head Office Address**: No. 12 Ihama Road, G.R.A, Benin City, Edo State
- **Registration Number**: RC No: 34296
- **Website**: www.ellahlakes.com
- **Email**: info@ellahlakes.com

#### Company Secretary
- **Name**: OAKE Legal

#### Agenda Items
The primary agenda item for the meeting is to consider the Company’s activities. Specific details regarding other matters to be discussed are not provided in the document.

#### Regulatory Requirements
The notice complies with corporate governance requirements for notifying board members of meetings, ensuring transparency and adherence to regulatory standards.

#### Conclusion
This document serves as an official communication to the Board of Directors of Ellah Lakes Plc regarding an upcoming meeting, detailing essential information such as the date, time, location, and agenda.
